Text: Litigation in ColoradoBear PawJim Bear Paw Energy an entity acquired by Northern Border Partners LP in March has been sued in District Court in Denver by a former employee over alleged promises concerning ownership in Bear Paw Through Britt Davis and Bonnie White we received several recommendations for counsel We spoke with Larry Treece the partner at Sherman Howard who previously handled an arbitration involving Western Gas Resources and EPP If there are no conflicts we will likely engage the firm of Sherman Howard Please let me know if you have any concerns with this engagement Thank you Janet

RE MESSAGE FROM JIM DERRICKWe have had no matters with Baker McKenzie Janet Place Original Message From Harris Stephanie J Sent Wednesday November PM To Tech Support Ale John Alvis Connie Braden Erica Cartier Autumn Cheek Charles Dapolite Gail Dodgen Kathy Elbertson Janette Esparza Elaine Evans Mark London Legal Forsyth Darlene C Fossum Drew Foy Tracy Haedicke Mark E Hicks Debra Jebousek Diana Johnson Kelly Kumbalek Lisa M Labanowski Elizabeth Lawless Michelle Lewis Karen Manly Marc Mintz Jordan Mordaunt Kristina Murray Tanja Newell Eric Nichols Douglas Place Janet Raybon Betsy Rieker Paula Rogers Rex Sample Molly Sellers Emily Sharp Vicki Wallace Stephen Walls Jr Rob Subject MESSAGE FROM JIM DERRICK Please let me know what matters you currently have or have had within the last two years with the law firm of Baker McKenzie Please let me know promptly Jim Derrick

NBP Services CorpUnanimous Consent Cc Drew and Rod I thought that I would give you a headsup that a Unanimous Consent is being circulated for your signature Northern Plains and NBP Services Corp are the sponsors of the Northern Border Phantom Unit Plan We have been working with the benefits group and Pat Mackin and have now prepared an Amended and Restated Northern Border Phantom Unit Plan The Consent authorizes the adoption and execution of that Plan I have initialed the Consent for your execution Should you need any further explanation please let me know Thanks Janet

Conference Call General Partner InterestStan Bill and Jerry In anticipation of our call tomorrow attached is an outline and memorandum on the provisions governing transferring of general partner interest Janet

Fax Cover Sheet Cc Mark Please disregard the comments on the fax cover sheet just sent to you You should have received with the cover sheet the Notice letter from Crestone Energy Ventures LLC regarding the Master Services Agreement If you did not receive that letter please notify me as soon as possible Janet Place

RE Fax Cover Sheet Cc Please verify the Houston fax number Isnt a Denver prefix Thanks Original Message From Whitt Mark Sent Friday November PM To Place Janet Cc Bump Dan J Subject RE Fax Cover Sheet Please also fax this letter to our credit war room in Houston The is Original Message From Place Janet Sent Friday November PM To Whitt Mark Cc Mathews William Subject Fax Cover Sheet Mark Please disregard the comments on the fax cover sheet just sent to you You should have received with the cover sheet the Notice letter from Crestone Energy Ventures LLC regarding the Master Services Agreement If you did not receive that letter please notify me as soon as possible Janet Place
